Игра сложновата и немного монотонна. Но в целом понимаю, почему это классика! Она научила меня экономить своё здоровье, лишний раз не вставать на линию огня и следить за каждым патроном. Особенно при попадании в Зен с патронами возникают большие проблемы. Всё это на нормальном уровне сложности. Я боюсь представить что происходит на сложном. Сохраняться нужно будет каждые 10 секунд... I finally played this game after knowing about it for years, and I am so glad I did. I haven't finished it yet, but I can already tell that this game absolutely slaps. I really regret not playing this sooner. I played Alyx before this, and aside from the graphics, this game completely holds up against modern titles such as Alyx, and it is most definitely better than many other modern AAA titles like The Last of Us 2 and Cyberpunk. Even with the mind-blowing graphics in those games, I would consider this game to be more fun both story-wise and gameplay wise. And the fact that it's not even half a gigabyte is a major bonus. 10/10 would recommend.

Its a really good fps
god game

Yeah, everyone already has this game. Pretty much everyone loves this game. And it's popular for a reason. it's just generally quite fun. there's no particularly unmemorable parts, the shooting is responsive and punchy and the movement is fast and easy to to learn. In the event you somehow don't own this I'd recommend picking it up if, for no other reason, than to experience FPS history.

虽然年代久远有点玩不下去，但我还是必须给好评

Half-Life is really impressive for it's time. The story was pretty shallow but enjoyable. I found myself getting stuck constantly and having to search up walk throughs because I was over thinking everything. You just kind of need to turn your brain off and play. Experienced minimal bugs, and was much longer than I expected for such an old game! Graphics are of course dated, but completely fine. I recommend anyone who is interested to play this classic.

já quebrei 5 costelas de rage por ser um jogo "meio" velho, mas envelheceu bem pra caralho, recomendo, 8 horas de dedo no cu e bastaaaante gritaria, comprem o pack completo de half lifes com desconto (8 jogos) vale a pena de mais.

Not great. Is it sometimes fun, kinda. It has aged so badly in my opinion. I tried to play it on normal mode and I got my ass handed to me, but it wasn't a "Oh I need to try better" kinda way, it was a "What the hell am I doing wrong?". It got to the point where I just, didn't want to play anymore. I've tried so many times to play it, but I just can't. I played half life 2 and loved it so much, so it sucks that I can't enjoy this as much.

Игра мне очень понравилась! Я прошёл её полностью, и потратил столько нервов. Сюжет не плохой на то время да и сейчас норм. Короче игра клёвая советую для покупки тем кто сможет продержатся до конца, потому что игра писец какая сложная! Я так сильно мучался и бесился из-за того что враги пиздец какие агрессивные на последних главах. И иногда бывают баги, но это прям изредко. Ну а так такой хардкор от игры 98 года я ожидал и знал на что иду. И на баги старался необращать так как игра старая! Ну всё это весь обзор, игра топ! Советую тем кто готов попробовать у знать вселенную, ну и тем кто готов малесь помучится))
Esse jogo é um diamante no mundo dos jogos!

So many modern video game tropes and gameplay features can be attributed to this absolutely fantastic and influential title which is more than worthy of its title as the greatest first person shooter of all time. So much of the video game industry was possible because of the breakthrough innovations made by this game. For god's sake, this game practically invented storytelling in a video game! Its fascinating how a 23 year old game has managed to hold up and is definitely leagues above almost all the shooters that succeeded it (Unless you're counting Half-Life 2 and Bioshock) An absolute recommend. You should probably save your money by just buying this game instead of those buggy and un-innovative, so-called AAA titles coming out in this age and use your remaining money to buy the rest of the games in the series. Give us a Half-Life 3 already, Valve! (I know Alyx came out last year, but still)
